imdb.plot outline: Manga on web is a Japanese TV Show about to comic by Haruka and Mangaka. Haruka and Mangaka are the leading members of a popular idol group Sweet named Manga on web. One day, Haruka is called by Mangaka during the recording of a TV program. Manga on web gets many fans and gives her a odiens.
imdb.title: Manga on Web
plot: Manga on web is a Japanese TV Show about to comic by Haruka and Mangaka.::Anonymous
